page.title: 18CAR SURVEY
page.content:
We had been told that Henry Ford said you can any colour car you like provided its black.As it was a nice day we went to the fly over road on the A1.We did the survey from 1115 to 1135 BST.Different groups looked at the Southbond and Northbound traffic. We were able to note car registrations and using an old Automobile ,Association Handbook (1959-60), find out where cars and trucks were registered. The four most popular colours were:-
a. Blue -93 b. Red -86 c. White-77 d. Green-33
Class of 85/86
